# run docker container
docker run -itd -v my-app:/root/docker-dir -v gdb-path:/root/docker-gdb -v .vscode-server-path:/roor/.vscode-server --privileged=true gcc /bin/bash


# guide
https://blog.csdn.net/hanq4998/article/details/84675718

# download gdb source
https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/gnu/gdb/

# extract .tar.xz

# make build dir
mkdir gdb-source-path/build
cd gdb-source-path/build

# compile gdb
../configure --prefix=gdb-source-path/build
make
